DOC.brief_title: Prospective Observational Study Describe Characteristics Management Patients Treated With Denosumab ( Prolia® ) Routine Clinical Practice
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Women clinical diagnosis postmenopausal osteoporosis Decision make treat denosumab 60 mg every 6 month Have receive first injection denosumab within 8 week prior enrol study . Appropriate write informed consent obtain ( require per local country regulation ) Exclusion Criteria Participating ongoing participate previous denosumab clinical trial Participation clinical device trial last 6 month Contraindicated treatment Prolia® accord approve applicable local product label .
